Overview.content: Websites have to handle images flexibly and adapt them to the used screen size. The ImageBean enables you to access the information of an image and edit the image. Here we explain, how the ImageBean works and how you can use it to manipulate images

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get an overview of the image handling with the help of the ImageBean.

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: See how to create a set of multiple scaled versions of one image to use the one with the optimized resolution for the situation.
